name: Sprint Skid
description:
Learn how to skid, run away from chasers, find a way from the maze, overcome force fields, light up your way in the darkness.

These and many more are the challenges you have to overcome in order to meet "skid-to-skid" with Triax, current Dark Skid Master, in the final race. On your journey, you will need to advise for your friend Vector, fast fingers, clever decision making in skid selection, intuition, strong nerves and perhaps luck too.
